name: Puppet Zoo Pilomy
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

PUPPET ZOO PILOMY is a simulation game that plays like toy blocks. Build up different kinds of animals with the parts by manipulating the simple controls, and explore the nature with your animals today.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
